title: Transitory vs. permanent tariffs
summary: We estimate transitory and permanent import tariff shocks in the United States over the postwar period. We find that transitory tariff increases are neither inflationary nor contractionary, and are not associated with monetary tightening.
fullContent: We estimate transitory and permanent import tariff shocks in the United States over the postwar period. We find that transitory tariff increases are neither inflationary nor contractionary, and are not associated with monetary tightening. In contrast, permanent tariff increases trigger a temporary rise in inflation (a one-off increase in the price level) and a brief […] The post Transitory vs. permanent tariffs appeared first on Marginal REVOLUTION.

fullContent: These laggards were identified using specific filters: a market cap below Rs 1,000 crore, a stock price under Rs 20, and a minimum recent trading volume of 5 lakh shares.

title: Central Park taps advisors for planned 2027 real estate IPO
summary: Central Park plans to list its real estate business by early 2027 and its hospitality vertical in 3–4 years. With a Rs 11,000-crore launch pipeline, major projects in Gurugram, and land acquisitions in Rajasthan and Goa, the developer is targeting growth.
fullContent: Central Park plans to list its real estate business by early 2027 and its hospitality vertical in 3–4 years. With a Rs 11,000-crore launch pipeline, major projects in Gurugram, and land acquisitions in Rajasthan and Goa, the developer is targeting growth. FY25 pre-sales surged to Rs 1,600 crore from Rs 250 crore in FY24.

title: Fed’s Bowman Favors Three Interest-Rate Cuts This Year
summary: Bowman, who was appointed to the Fed in 2018 by President Donald Trump, also reiterated her view that tariff-driven price hikes were unlikely to move inflation up in a persistent way.
fullContent: Bowman, who was appointed to the Fed in 2018 by President Donald Trump, also reiterated her view that tariff-driven price hikes were unlikely to move inflation up in a persistent way.

title: UK Steps Up Gaza Aid As Israel Plans To Expand Offensive
US, Japan Working To Announce Reciprocal Tariffs Won’t Stack
summary: The announcement, which could take the form of a joint statement from the two countries, would clarify that Japan would see its 15% reciprocal levy incorporate existing most-favored nation duties.
fullContent: The announcement, which could take the form of a joint statement from the two countries, would clarify that Japan would see its 15% reciprocal levy incorporate existing most-favored nation duties.

title: Gaza City: Italy's First Shipment Of Humanitarian Aid To Gaza Carried Out By Italian Air Force C-130

title: Sunseeking Germans Face Swiss Backlash Over Alpine Holiday Congestion
summary: Switzerland’s tolerance for foreign drivers clogging up its highways is wearing so thin that some politicians now want to make them pay extra for the privilege.
fullContent: Switzerland’s tolerance for foreign drivers clogging up its highways is wearing so thin that some politicians now want to make them pay extra for the privilege.

title: FPIs withdraw close to Rs 18,000 cr from equities in Aug on trade tension, disappointing earnings
summary: Foreign investors have pulled out nearly Rs 18,000 crore from Indian equities so far this month, weighed down by escalating US-India trade tensions, disappointing first-quarter corporate earnings, and a weakening Indian rupee.
fullContent: Foreign investors have pulled out nearly Rs 18,000 crore from Indian equities so far this month, weighed down by escalating US-India trade tensions, disappointing first-quarter corporate earnings, and a weakening Indian rupee.
